title: Workshop on Designing Generic and Content-Neutral Instructional Strategies for Digital Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education theories and foundational instructional design knowledge
context.additional_context: Strengthening the competency of pre-service and in-service teachers to design instructional strategies applicable in electronic learning environments.

learning_goals: Design three or more instructional strategies for electronic education using machine-readable language
Analyze cases of content-neutral instructional strategies applied to mathematics education and suggest improvement measures
Develop and evaluate instructional strategies based on formative assessment using educational design tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
